job_description: Мы ищем опытного Backend разработчика для работы над высоконагруженным API нашего продукта. Вы будете проектировать и разрабатывать микросервисы на Python, оптимизировать производительность, работать с большими данными. Требуется опыт с FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, и навыки проектирования распределенных систем.

candidates.resume_text: Experienced Linux kernel developer with deep knowledge of C programming, systems architecture, and version control. Created Git version control system. Expert in low-level programming, operating systems, and distributed systems architecture. Strong background in performance optimization and scalability.
candidates.education: MSc Computer Science, University of Helsinki
candidates.notes: Very experienced, but background in C/Linux rather than Python/Web

candidates.resume_text: Creator of Python programming language. Over 30 years of experience in language design, compilers, and software architecture. Strong background in Python core development, type systems, and language evolution. Experience with web frameworks and backend development. Led Python development at Dropbox and Microsoft.
candidates.education: MSc Mathematics & Computer Science, University of Amsterdam
candidates.notes: Python creator! But need to verify modern web framework experience (FastAPI/Django)

candidates.resume_text: Senior Python Backend Developer specializing in scalable web services, data engineering, and cloud architecture. 8+ years of experience building high-performance APIs with FastAPI, Flask, and Django. Expert in PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes. Strong DevOps skills with AWS and Terraform. Contributed to multiple open-source projects including system design resources and data science tools.
candidates.notes: Strong technical profile with modern stack. Good fit for requirements.

candidates.resume_text: Python developer and open-source contributor. Created Requests library (50M+ downloads). Experience with web development, API design, and developer tools. Background in backend development with Flask and various Python frameworks.
candidates.notes: Strong Python background, but need to verify FastAPI/modern framework experience

candidates.resume_text: Creator of FastAPI framework. Senior Python Backend Developer with 10+ years experience in web development, API design, and distributed systems. Expert in FastAPI, Pydantic, SQLAlchemy, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes. Strong background in building high-performance async APIs and developer tools. Experience with microservices architecture and cloud-native development.
candidates.notes: FastAPI creator - perfect technical fit! Verify culture fit and team collaboration.
